file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-00-00-06 - DOORS - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DOORS - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to visually examine the red marks of the doors. B. These procedures are applicable to the red marks of the airstairs door, side-hinged main door, and service door. C. The red marks are in the lock boxes, locking mechanisms, and upper stops of the doors. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 52-00-00-200-801-A ♦ DOOR RED MARKS - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-00-00 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-00-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. DOOR RED MARKS - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to visually examine the red marks of the airstairs door, side- hinged main door, and service door for general conditions and visibility. (2) These procedures are applicable to the red marks of the lock boxes, locking mechanisms, upper stops of the airstairs door, side-hinged main door and service doors (PRE-MOD. S.B. 145-52-0033), and upper door stop and fuselage door alignment indicator of the airstairs door, side-hinged main door, and service doors (POST-MOD. S.B. 145-52-0033). (3) The red marks of the lock boxes are visible through the sight glasses in the door linings. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM 25-23-04 - CPM 51-21-06 - S.B.145-52-0033 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Main door 821 Service door LH passenger cabin, airstairs door 231 frame LH passenger cabin, side-hinged main 231 door frame RH passenger cabin, service door 232 frame D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the doors available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) 01.161.1.826 Paint, PV red AR EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-00-00 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Airstairs door and Airstairs door frame, or side-hinged main door and side-hinged 1 Does the task main door frame, or service door and serv- ice door frame I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the airstairs door. (2) Open the side-hinged main door. (3) Open the service door. J. Visually Check Locking Red Marks (Figure 601) (Figure 602) (Figure 603) SUBTASK 211-002-A (1) Make sure that there are red marks on the locks and covers of the lock boxes, track assemblies, cam of the locking mechanisms (2 positions for the airstairs door and side- hinged main door and 1 position for the service door), door upper stop and door-frame upper stop (PRE-MOD. S.B.145-52-0033) or door upper stop and fuselage door alignment indicator (POST-MOD. S.B. 145-52-0033). (2) Specially examine the red marks for general conditions and visibility. (3) If a discrepancy is found, do the steps bellow: (a) For access the lock boxes, remove the main door lining811CW or 811PW, or side-hinged main door 811, or service-door lining 821CW or 821BW, as applicable. Refer to AMM 25-23-04 (b) Apply red paint to repair the red mark. Refer CPM 51-21-06 K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the airstairs door. (2) Close the side-hinged main door. (3) Close the service door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-00-00 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
